citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35AM on 29-
November-2023. The inspector knocked, honked the car horn and called the phone number on file, but did not get a
response. The inspector waited 30 minutes prior to leaving.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35AM on 29-
November-2023. The inspector knocked, honked the car horn and called the phone number on file, but did not get a 
response. The inspector waited 30 minutes prior to leaving. 
 
 
End Section
